tool_description: A database containing data allsides.com and mediabiasfactcheck.com.
name: Political Bias Database
title: Political Bias Database

api_list.name: Introduction Page
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://political-bias-database.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "political-bias-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
